name: Cucumber-Scallion Salad
keywords: cucumber, scallion, gluten-free, vegan, vegetarian, side dish, summer
recipeIngredient: 2 large cucumbers, peeled, seeded and cut across into 1/4-inch-thick pieces
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the cucumbers and scallions in a medium-size bowl. Add the vinaigrette and toss to coat. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Divide among 4 plates and serve.
